answers.text:
Hi William, 
Unfortunately we do not have specific information on geotubes specifically but this document discusses green infrastructure and also touches on protecting coastal residents. I hope you find this document useful and that other local government professionals chime in with more specific information for you. 
icma.org/Documents/Document/Document/2767
Best, 
Robin Saywitz 
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern 
rsaywitz@icma.org

author: William Goetz
text:
Anybody had any experience with geotubes to protect coastal infrastructure? 
How about as a base for dunes?
Cost and cost-effectiveness?
Anyone in the ACE?
I'm particularly interested about use in Florida.
title: Geotubes?
